text.name: info6
text.text: Sound : 5 channels wavetable synthesis , 8-bit mono, mixed at ~15Khz and output via PWM

text.name: info7
text.text: Resolution : Various video modes supporting up to 360x224 pixels in tiles-only mode

text.name: info8
text.text: Colors : 256 simultaneous colors arranged in a 3:3:2 color space
